headings: Do you love to crunch the numbers?
What Can You Do With an Accounting Degree?
Why Earn My Accounting Degree at Angelo State?
paragraphs: If you don’t cringe at the word “budget” and a calculator is your friend, then a major in accounting could be your calling. In our program, you’ll gain the knowledge and skills you need for a career in accounting, auditing, budget analysis, fraud prevention or other related fields. In addition to accounting, you’ll learn statistical analysis, financial management and the processes of business management.

Our bachelor’s degree in accounting will prepare you to work in any type of business, at nonprofit organizations, at government agencies or even in the FBI. It will also set you up to move on to graduate school to qualify for the Certified Public Accountancy (CPA) exam, or to enter law school.
Contact Information
The Norris-Vincent College of Business is accredited by AACSB International.

Our B.B.A. in Accounting sets you up to head right into ourMaster of Professional Accountancy(M.P.Ac.) degree program without taking additional courses. Earning your M.P.Ac. allows you to sit for the Certified Public Accountancy exam to become a licensed CPA.
Degree Plan

Our professional faculty bring real-world experience to the classroom and offer an industry perspective of accounting and finance. You’ll have the chance to work with them on research projects, and our small class sizes mean you get the individual attention you deserve.
Accounting Faculty and Staff
ASU Distinguished ScholarshipsOur premier scholarships are awarded based on your academic achievement, and you don’t even have to apply. You are automatically considered once you are admitted to ASU.
General ScholarshipsWe offer over 600 different types of scholarships. You can apply for both our general scholarships and degree-specific scholarships with one application.
Blue and Gold GuaranteeIf you have financial need, you may qualify forfree tuitionto attend Angelo State.
There continues to be strong demand in Texas and across the U.S. for accountants, auditors, financial analysts and personal financial advisors, and in many similar fields.
The U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics reports that employment opportunities in these areas are expected to grow steadily through 2031, adding thousands of high-paying jobs.
Explore Career Possibilities

You can engage with professionals at local businesses and accounting firms through our robust internship and shadowing programs. We have received a grant from the U.S. Department of Education to expand and enhance these programs, so there are multiple opportunities for paid internships. You can also sharpen your skills in our college’s Housley Principled Leadership Program and by working on research projects with your professors.

You can join our chapter of the Beta Alpha Psi honor society for networking and professional development opportunities, as well as social events. You’ll also have access to all the services in ourCenter for Student Success. It’s a one-stop resource to help you achieve your academic and professional goals and enhance your college experience.

You can gain a global perspective of various business practices on our annual summer study abroad trip to Europe. You’ll visit cities in Austria, Czech Republic, England, France, Germany, Greece, Italy, Slovakia and Spain that host numerous multinational corporations and other international organizations. You’ll also get to visit various historical sites to truly broaden your horizons.

Take your education to the next level in theASU Honors Program. Through special courses, cultural events, research and community engagement, we’ll help you transform your intellectual and personal talents into marketable skills for your future. You’ll also have the opportunity to participate in prestigious internships, fellowships and other programs to reach your full potential.
Explore the Honors Advantage

OurFreshman Collegeis a one-stop resource for programs and services that help you transition into college life, improve your communication skills, and engage in active learning. You can also get academic help in theMath LabandWriting Center, receive peer mentoring and tutoring throughSupplemental Instruction, or set up onlinetutoringsessions.
If you want to go fast, go alone. But if you want to go far, go together.
